term: What is the issue with nullification doctrine?
content:
also, if states are able to now pick and choose their laws, it would ultimately break up the country

this nullification doctrine is going to be attached to a number of issues over the next 50 years
	here it came up by the DRs in reaction to these laws
	when marbury vs madison comes up, the court is going to have a vehicle to deal with this type of issue
	the federalists aren’t going to like the war of 1812 and they are going to bring it up in their arguments against the war of 1812
	the south isn’t going to like a tariff in the 1830s and are going to bring it up in regards to that tariff
